summary: After WW1,ordinary citizens of a small Greek village plays the Passion Play in order to rebel against Turkish rulers during Turkish-Greek relations in 1920's.
cast: Jean Servais|Carl Möhner|Grégoire Aslan|Gert Fröbe|Teddy Bilis|René Lefèvre|Lucien Raimbourg|Melina Mercouri|Roger Hanin|Pierre Vaneck|Dimos Starenios|Nicole Berger|Maurice Ronet|Fernand Ledoux|Anna Armaou|Nitza Avantagelou|Joe Dassin|Panos Karavousanos|Nasos Kedrakas|Rita Mousouri|Olympia Papadouka|Stefanos Skopelitis
keywords: liberation theology|small town|temporary truce|manipulative priest|manipulative female
title: El que debe morir
